content.text: Match ends, Roma 2(4), Manchester City 2(5).
Second Half ends, Roma 2, Manchester City 2.
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Enes Ünal (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Samir Nasri (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by James Horsfield.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ashley Cole.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Rony Lopes (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Roma 2, Manchester City 2. Adem Ljajic (Roma) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Seydou Doumbia (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Iago Falque (Roma) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mattia Destro.
Foul by Iago Falque (Roma).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jesús Navas (Manchester City).
Ashley Cole (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Manchester City. George Evans replaces Vincent Kompany.
Foul by Leandro Castán (Roma).
Jesús Navas (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Brandon Barker (Manchester City).
Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa (Roma) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Rony Lopes (Manchester City).
Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Mattia Destro (Roma) header from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Adem Ljajic with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Jesús Navas.
Substitution, Manchester City. Enes Ünal replaces Kelechi Iheanacho.
Attempt saved. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Yaya Touré.
Attempt blocked. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Seydou Doumbia.
Foul by Mattia Destro (Roma).
James Horsfield (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City).
Radja Nainggolan (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Roma. Seydou Doumbia replaces Miralem Pjanic.
Substitution, Roma. Bogdan Lobont replaces Morgan De Sanctis.
Offside, Manchester City. Jesús Navas tries a through ball, but Kelechi Iheanacho is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Seydou Keita (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Seydou Keita (Roma) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic following a set piece situation.
Radja Nainggolan (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Foul by James Horsfield (Manchester City).
Adem Ljajic (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Jesús Navas (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Rony Lopes.
Attempt missed. Adem Ljajic (Roma) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.
Attempt saved. Rony Lopes (Manchester City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jesús Navas with a cross.
Attempt missed. Jesús Navas (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Yaya Touré.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Leandro Castán.
Attempt blocked. Samir Nasri (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Goal!  Roma 1, Manchester City 2. Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner.
Maicon (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Brandon Barker (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Adem Ljajic (Roma) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan.
Substitution, Roma. Adem Ljajic replaces Salih Ucan.
Substitution, Manchester City. Brandon Barker replaces Raheem Sterling.
Substitution, Manchester City. Aleksandar Kolarov replaces Gaël Clichy.
Substitution, Roma. Radja Nainggolan replaces Gervinho.
Substitution, Roma. Mattia Destro replaces Francesco Totti.
Substitution, Roma. Leandro Castán replaces Alessio Romagnoli.
Substitution, Roma. Iago Falque replaces Juan Iturbe.
Substitution, Manchester City. Joe Hart replaces Willy Caballero.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jesús Navas replaces Manu García.
Second Half begins Roma 1, Manchester City 1.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jason Denayer replaces Eliaquim Mangala.
Substitution, Roma. Maicon replaces Alessandro Florenzi.
Substitution, Manchester City. Rony Lopes replaces David Silva.
Substitution, Manchester City. Samir Nasri replaces Bruno Zuculini.
Substitution, Manchester City. Yaya Touré replaces Fernando.
Substitution, Manchester City. James Horsfield replaces Bacary Sagna.
Substitution, Roma. Seydou Keita replaces Vasilis Torosidis.
Substitution, Roma. Ashley Cole replaces Daniele De Rossi.
Substitution, Roma. Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa replaces Kostas Manolas.
First Half ends, Roma 1, Manchester City 1.
Hand ball by Gervinho (Roma).
Offside, Roma. Juan Iturbe tries a through ball, but Gervinho is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by David Silva.
Attempt missed. Daniele De Rossi (Roma) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Eliaquim Mangala.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Vasilis Torosidis (Roma).

Offside, Manchester City. Kelechi Iheanacho tries a through ball, but Bruno Zuculini is caught offside.
Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Alessio Romagnoli (Roma).
Attempt saved. Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by David Silva with a cross.
Attempt blocked. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Juan Iturbe (Roma).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Alessio Romagnoli.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Juan Iturbe.
Attempt missed. Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high.

Foul by Bruno Zuculini (Manchester City).
Juan Iturbe (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bacary Sagna (Manchester City).
Attempt blocked. Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Bruno Zuculini.
Attempt blocked. Vasilis Torosidis (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Francesco Totti.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Juan Iturbe (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Manchester City. David Silva tries a through ball, but Raheem Sterling is caught offside.
Manu García (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Miralem Pjanic (Roma).
Attempt saved. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gaël Clichy.
Goal!  Roma 1, Manchester City 1. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Gervinho.
Offside, Manchester City. Willy Caballero tries a through ball, but Kelechi Iheanacho is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Bacary Sagna.
Offside, Roma. Salih Ucan tries a through ball, but Gervinho is caught offside.
Goal!  Roma 0, Manchester City 1. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kelechi Iheanacho with a through ball.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Alessandro Florenzi.
First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, Roma 2(4), Manchester City 2(5).
Penalty saved! Seydou Keita (Roma) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(4), Manchester City 2(5). James Horsfield (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty saved! Seydou Doumbia (Roma) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(4), Manchester City 2(4). Joe Hart (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(4), Manchester City 2(3). Iago Falque (Roma) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(3), Manchester City 2(3). Rony Lopes (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(3), Manchester City 2(2). Mattia Destro (Roma) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(2), Manchester City 2(2). Jesús Navas (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Roma 2(2), Manchester City 2(1). Adem Ljajic (Roma) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot is too high. Aleksandar Kolarov should be disappointed.
Goal!  Roma 2(1), Manchester City 2(1). Radja Nainggolan (Roma) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Roma 2, Manchester City 2(1). Yaya Touré (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Penalty Shootout begins Roma 2, Manchester City 2.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
